title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): markdown, code highlighting, model manager, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, Kotlin extensions, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with any Ollama model; includes conversation history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns local Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 40+ recipes: PDF chatbot, voice assistant, function calling, GPU offloading, etc.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing dependency-injected Ollama service with RxJS streams and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: uses Ollama for generation, Chroma for vectors, and LangChain for chunking.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for chatting with Ollama; supports streaming, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using Ollama models; inline prompts and template variables.

title: ollama-microsoft-bot-framework
summary: Microsoft Bot Framework adapter enabling Teams, Slack, and Telegram bots powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template with session memory, model selector, and token-per-second benchmark.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small surface area, idiomatic error handling, and context cancellation.
